DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to test whether the health care provider access and training in CERTAIN (Checklist for Early Recognition and Treatment of Acute Illness), would facilitate timely and error free best-practice delivery and minimize preventable death and costly complications in critically ill patients.
DOC.brief_title: The Checklist for Early Recognition and Treatment of Acute Illness (CERTAIN)
